name: advanced
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool chess_puzzles_v2.
Tool description: Quickly access 1.000.000+ chess puzzles!
API description: Fetches advanced chess puzzles based on various search criteria from an external API.

number_of_puzzles.description: Number of puzzles to fetch. Defaults to 1.

themes.description: Comma-separated list of puzzle themes. Defaults to 'kingsideAttack,middlegame'.

theme_search_type.description: Specifies whether puzzles need to have all themes ('AND') or any theme ('OR'). Defaults to 'AND'.

number_of_moves.description: Total number of moves in the puzzles. Defaults to 4.

opening_variation.description: The opening variation of the puzzles. Defaults to 'Kings_Gambit_Accepted_Abbazia_Defense'.

rating.description: Rating of the puzzles. Defaults to '1200'.

opening_family.description: The opening family of the puzzles. Defaults to 'Kings_Gambit_Accepted'.
